text.paragraph: I'm a software developer, graphics designer and open source contributor (JavaScript and TypeScript).

I've authered multiple libraries and frameworks including
Odom ,
RIU Neumorphism
and
Parawait . I have developed a number of websites and web apps including
Moonilizer and
Kingdom Developments Map . Most of my work in graphics design is related to web development; icons, logos, mockups, prototypes, image manipulation and the like.

I am open minded, always eager to learn, hardworking and always looking for better ways to do things. I am passionate about computer technologies (especially web technologies), computer graphics, Internet of Things (IoT), telecommunications, automation, machine learning and artificial intelligence.
